name: eFinancial Communications
tag_list: business-intelligence, microsoft-bizspark, paperless, cross-selling, operational-efficiency, document-management
overview:
eFinancial Communications provides a patent-pending business intelligence platform, sponsored by Microsoft BizSpark, that enables clients to:

 Go paperless and significantly reduce operating costs  Digitally organize and enrich data in such a way that the generic becomes customized, the manual becomes automated, and the aimless becomes targeted.  Interact with a single point integrations company covering dozens of digital service providers (less expensive, easier to implement, easier to maintain and more effective).  Ability to turn every correspondence into a targeted, relevant communication.  Turn communication cost centers into revenue generators.

Compliance: FFIEC, FDIC, OCC, Federal Reserve Board, SEC, NAFCU, CUNA, World Council of Credit Unions, SSAE16.
